communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Beneficiaries of HAVANA ACT
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide the number of all beneficiaries of HAVANA Act since its implementation until October 1, 2024. (HAVANA Act of 2021, Public Law 117-46, 135 Stat. 391 (2021) (codified at 22 U.S.C. 2680b(i))

Please, provide a number of beneficiaries approved since the implementation of the updated rule that became effective on  May 20, 2024 until October 1, 2024 (Implementation of HAVANA Act of 2021, 28 CFR Part 106., JMD Docket No. 157; A.G. Order No. 5922-2024, RIN 1105-AB71).

Please provide demographics for each number of beneficiaries,  such as Federal Agency, age, gender, family members, and the number of children as beneficiaries.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Leonid Ber
